Posts.title: Bee Farming
Posts.content: With ksh. 6500 you are good to go! You will have one hive and from there you will do splitting

Posts.title: Organic Farming
Posts.content: organic farming involves utilizing natural compost and manure for farming purposes. No use of chemicals.

Posts.title: Pig Farming
Posts.content: Pig farming  is one of the easiest ventures one can opt to do. They need less feeding, give them iron vaccine and you are good to go

Posts.title: planting watermelon
Posts.content: prepare land in good time, put a handful fertilizer in a hole and cover it with some soil

Posts.title: Chicken Rearing
Posts.content: It is important to vaccinate your chicks on time to prevent them from diseases.
